channel.title: Jquery on Brain Baking

item.title: jquery
item.author: wouter.groeneveld@gmail.com (Wouter Groeneveld)
item.description: Jquery Eigen CSS filters maken $.expr[':'].external = function(elem,index,match) { var url = elem.href || elem.src, loc = window.location; return !!url.match(new RegExp('^' + loc.protocol + '//' + '(?!' + loc.hostname + ')' )); }; // You can now use it within your selectors: // Find all external anchors: $('a:external'); // Find all external script elements: $('script:external'); // Determine if link is external: $('a#mylink').is(':external'); // true/false Via Things you may not know about jQuery
